Summary: AbstractAddress setData('custom_attributes', AttributeValue[]) breaks customAttributes
[Issue] Wrong type hint for the protected member $_urlHelper
Custom field (Release Note): The system now Fixes the wrong type hint with the correct one, that is also used in constructor

Summary: Scope bug in Catalog URL resource (_getCategories)
Custom field (Release Note): This PR adds a fallback to default scope if there is no value defined on the store scope in category URL resource.

Summary: Wrong Order total, the round is not applied to the price calculation.
Custom field (Release Note):
The system is now correctly handles when calculating the price_after_discount, discount_amount and taxes amount.
the actual total of the order

Summary: Error when run command setup:upgrade with custom DB trigger
[Issue] Check if OpenGraph can show price
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working fine when we use plugin which hides the price and with this change price is not visible in the OG tag.

Summary: Website/Group/Store entity form can't be extended with multiple value form element for extension attributes
Custom field (Release Note): This PR allowes multivalue form elements to submit data to website/group/store form.

Summary: [Issue] Remove scope resolver usage
Custom field (Release Note): This PR resolves the Admin URL settings globally instead of the current store

Summary: Price is always 0 for bundle product items without dynamic price in order rest API
Percentage discount on tier price and catalog price rule calculated on original price without selected options.
WYSIWYG is empty in dynamic rows
Deprecated Functionality: Creation of dynamic property Magento\Framework\Acl::$_roleRegistry
v2.4.7-p1 Magento reorder -1 order numbers
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working as expected and after reorder from the backend the order number will be unique 8 digits

Summary: Magento 2.4.7 minAllowed missing product order qty
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working fine and page source is showing correctly the min qty of the product

Summary: FPT value in cart page and product page are different for same configurations for simple product
Multiselect/select attribute options can not be saved when Swatches modules disabled
FPT value in cart page and product page are different for same configurations for a dynamic product
Special Price To Date is wrongly validated on applySpecialPrice
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working fine regarding Special price and Product special price will be expire on date set by admin or 3rd party system by REST API

Summary: Magento Version exposure via Setup route with default Nginx Configuration
Custom field (Release Note): The system is now working as expected and do not expose the exact version of Magento the site is running

Summary: [Issue] refactor quote address do validate method
Custom field (Release Note): This PR includes readability improvements to the doValidate method.

Summary: Magento option --magento-init-params never used when running cli?
getItemsByColumnValue wrong type declaration
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly defines the input parameter $value as a primitive type, not an array, in the getItemsByColumnValue function, ensuring that the function returns the expected collection. Previously, if an array with a single value was used as the input parameter, the function would return null and IDEs would mark it as an error.

Summary: After upgrade to magento 2.4.7 p2 can't see newly uploaded files media gallery
[Issue] Ignore lib/internal/Magento/Framework/App/Test/Unit/_files/app/etc/en…
Custom field (Release Note): The system now ignores the file 'env.php' that gets generated when running unit tests, ensuring that the git status remains clean after running tests. Previously, running unit tests would generate a new file 'env.php', causing the git status to show a new file found and making it appear dirty.

Summary: [Issue] Fix integration test issue with interceptor
Custom field (Release Note): The system now correctly identifies and handles the \Magento\TestFramework\App\Config\Interceptor in the integration test, ensuring that the test can access the necessary data even when a plugin on the class exists. Previously, the system failed to account for the possibility of the \Magento\TestFramework\App\Config being a \Magento\TestFramework\App\Config\Interceptor, resulting in an error when attempting to access the $data property.

Summary: RestApi request '/rest/default/V1/categories?searchCriteria%5Bpage_size%5D=1' fails with timeout error
Issue when updating customer email in Admin Panel with ö and .swiss domain
[Issue] MFTF: Submitting Email To Friend Form with enabled captcha
Custom field (Release Note): The test case addresses the functionality of the "Email to Friend" form when CAPTCHA is enabled, ensuring that the form submission process works correctly with both incorrect and correct CAPTCHA values.

Summary: [TestFramework] Usages of TestCase::getTestResultObject are invalid since phpunit v10
Grouped Product Frontend Quantity Validations are Missing
Custom field (Release Note): The system is now working fine and displaying validation error when we are trying to add negative qty and max qty

Summary: Completely removing a gallery-image from be keeps scope roles/types set (base/small/thumbnail) and after re-adding "old" roles/types appear
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working as expected in the store scopes the images inherit the roles/types of the new added image as per the default scope

Summary: [Small Bug] Filter of Admin Panel `listing component` cannot hit when field value contains `\`
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working fine when we are filtering page title having slash in it(eg: Magento\Store)

Summary: [Bug] REST API: Update special prices does not set values for all store views
Magento Exception while executing Magento Payflow Pro Test
Cache Keys associated with FPC on Magento 2.4.7 multi-store implementations
Magento Rest API exposing PII
Issue with the Customizable Options grid on the product page in the admin panel
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working as expected when we are creating a customisable options with type dropdown

Summary: [\Magento\ConfigurableProduct\Model\Product\Type\Configurable] PHP error unoticed
Custom field (Release Note): This PR Change a loop variable name to correctly add the "_cache_instance_product_ids" data on the given product to be used on subsequent calls.

Summary: "The CMS page with the "0" ID doesn't exist" log flood
Custom field (Release Note): The system is working as expected after creating admin user and when we creating a new page system.log does not have any error messages

Summary: Newsletter subscribe enabled switch not working per website/store
Custom field (Release Note): The System Correctly handles subscription with newsletter when we are having multiple websites/storeviews when it was disabled at global level

Summary: Losing product custom option file upload when checking out with Adobe credit card payment method
Partial indexation stop working for customers with huge # of updates
Catalog link widgets uses incorrect URL
Custom field (Release Note): The System now correctly handles widgets after adding catalog product link and catalog category link and it shows correct urls in html source also

Summary: Investigate "use strict" is unnecessary inside of modules
Deprecate a "Product was viewed" customer segment condition
After Downloading shipping label we can see some shipping amount it was not matching with shipping and handling price.
[Issue] Removed email disclosure
Custom field (Release Note): The System now shows Display an error message indicating an incorrect email if the entered email is not required to confirm the account, regardless of whether the customer exists or not.

Summary: MView mechanism silently ignores errors on trigger execution
[Issue] Avoid lots of uncessary exceptions during layout XML merge loading
Custom field (Release Note): This PR introduce a new function (for B/C compat we don't overwrite the protected _loadXmlString) to load and not throw an exception

Summary: [Issue] Use constructor property promotion in module Vault graph Ql
Custom field (Release Note): This PR replace constructor properties with property promotion in VaultGraphQl module

Summary: [Issue] Removed code redundancy for module frontend layouts.
Custom field (Release Note): This PR removes code redundancy to theme layouts for Magento_Msrp, Magento_LoginAsCustomerAssistance, Magento_Newsletter & Magento_Sitemap modules frontend layouts.

Summary: [Issue] Remove code related to Microsoft IIS
Custom field (Release Note): This PR clean up the code related to Mircrosoft IIS as per Magento System Requirement documentation which states that the Microsoft Windows OS is not supported

Summary: Guest Prefix Not Saved to Quote Address 2.4.8
Requisition List Page Print Option Is Not Working
Magnifier.js syntax error
Custom field (Release Note): The system Magnifier functionality should keep working the way it worked before and magnifierOptions should not be available in global scope

Summary: [Issue] Update Store.php
Custom field (Release Note): This PR improves performance by skipping current store resolution.

Summary: Backport Verbose Mode in `setup:db:status` CLI command
SMTP mail send with tls and 2.4.8
[Issue] Fix concurrency issue in static content deploy
Custom field (Release Note): This PR fixes a bug in which multiple concurrent processes spin up to handle the same theme package, depending on how the themes are defined with their parents.

Summary: [Issue] Remove legacy compatibility code for PHP versions < 8.1
Custom field (Release Note):
This pull request removes code that was designed to be ran on PHP <8.1.
Also, removed checks for PHP_VERSION_ID contact availability, since it's available in all PHP versions

Summary: company field validation fails for guest checkout
FPC not work when login
Order State is disappeared while selecting value in Order state dropdown
[Issue] improve error handling SchemaBuilder
Custom field (Release Note): This PR improves the error message handling of db schema. It helps us to identify issue without heavy debugging.

Summary: Exclude hugerte Editor JS Files from Bundled Output Across Themes
Integration Test failure on SYNC PR for 2.4.9-alpha2-develop due to CliStateTest modification
Hover colour not applied on static grids in admin
Custom field (Release Note): Hover colors are now applied as expected on the rows of Admin static grids.[GitHub-35358](https://github.com/magento/magento2/issues/35358)

Summary: PHP8.1 type bugfix
Custom field (Release Note): The associated products are now initialized to an empty array instead of false when the strict processing mode is not active or when product information is available. This change ensures that the subsequent logic handling associated products behaves consistently, improving stability and predictability in the product preparation process.

Summary: Malformed request body or parameters cause "Internal Server Error"
[Issue] Fix mime type typo
Custom field (Release Note): The system correctly handles and fixed the mime type and typo for gif image

Summary: [Issue] Remove forbidden `@author` tag from framework (part 3)
Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to the coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Summary: [Issue] Use constructor property promotion in module send friend graph ql
Custom field (Release Note): The system now utilizes constructor property promotion in the 'send friend' GraphQL module, enhancing code readability and reducing complexity. Previously, the module used properties that occupied numerous lines, making the code more complex and less readable.

Summary: [Issue] Remove forbidden `@author` tag from `Magento_Downloadable`
Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to the coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing code quality and consistency. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to the coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to the coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Summary: [Issue] Remove forbidden `@author` tag
Custom field (Release Note): The system now adheres to the coding standards by removing the forbidden `@author` tag from certain modules, enhancing the overall code quality. Previously, the presence of this tag in some modules was in violation of the established coding standards.

Summary: [Issue] Improve Extensibility of Service URL Generation
Custom field (Release Note): The system now allows for customization of the Service URL Generation function via plugins, promoting a more maintainable approach to modifications. Previously, customization of this function was achieved through preferences, which may not have been as efficient or maintainable.

Summary: [Issue] Avoid direct access to reviews list Ajax
Custom field (Release Note): The system correctly handles and Avoid direct access to reviews list Ajax

Summary: [Issue] Set price on quote item instead of base_price
Custom field (Release Note): The system correctly handles quote item's price set to the base_price instead of the price if you have multiple currencies in one website on the frontend

Summary: Page Builder's Product component doesn't work if the user doesn't have Widget permission
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, when accessing a widget without permissions, the page was throwing a generic error and displaying a "loading" GIF. Now, after the fix, a modal window is displayed with "Sorry, you need permissions to view this content." message.

Summary: Wrong catalog price rule discount applied to the child product
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where the catalog price rule for the variation is overridden by the parent configurable product, in case where both rules have the same priority.

Summary: Environment specific unit tests failures in AC 2.4.7-p3
Custom field (Release Note): This issue fixes unit test failures that are not reproducing on all versions and environments. Previously to the fix some unit tests failed due different library versions or due to missing functionality added in a later version.

Summary: Restricted admin users can't mass update product status
Custom field (Release Note): The custom admin can mass update product status as it's a website-level property. The status is updated only on the websites the restricted admin has access too.

Summary: Not able to preview Scheduled Product update with Category Permissions enabled
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix a future to be enabled product was not being displayed in preview mode. Now it will be displayed even if the current status is disabled.

Summary: No store is available after redirecting to home page and checkout
Custom field (Release Note): Previously selected store will now be pre-selected in the “Pick in Store” shipping if the customer navigates to the payment page, then returns to the home page, and finally returns to the checkout page. Previously, after repeatedly returning to the checkout page, the selected store in the “Pick in Store” would be cleared.

Summary: [Cloud] Recent Orders not appearing in other store view if the orders are created on one store view
Custom field (Release Note): Resolved an issue where the "My Account" page did not display recent orders from other Store Views within the same Store. The order retrieval logic has been updated to ensure consistent order visibility across all Store Views, aligning with the behavior of the "My Orders" page.

Summary: Scope is showing different Store View during Preview
Custom field (Release Note): Previous to the fix, a staging update preview of cms block and cms page content might have opened in a different store, than the store assigned on the cms block or page when accessed from Content Staging Dashboard. After the fix, if the cms block or page have only a specific store assigned in the staging update, the preview from Content Staging Dashboard will open with the correct store selected.

Summary: All items from other customers compare lists are assigned to the customer after logging in via the admin
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, when an admin used the "Login as Customer" feature in the backend, products from the compare list of a previously logged-in customer were incorrectly assigned to the currently impersonated customer.  After the fix the compare list loads correctly for the correct logged-in customer.

Summary: [Staging2] Stored cards are not visible on Admin panel
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where the "Stored Card" payment option no longer appeared in the backend order placement form after an upgrade.

Summary: Bundled/Merged JS not part of SRI Hashes
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix generated bundle or merged files were not being added to SRI hashes list. Now, the files are being proprly added to the SRI hashes.

Summary: Missing validation for Catalog Price rule discount amount field
Custom field (Release Note): Previously, the discount_amount field in the staging schedule update was not validated correctly with the current validation rules. However, after applying the fix, the discount_amount field will be validated appropriately.

Summary: [Mainline] [CLOUD] Image Resizing consumes over 400GB of disk space
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the `catalog:images:resize` command used with --skip_hidden_images flag will not generate image caches for websites where images are not present.

Summary: Issue with upgrade 2.4.7-p5 due to added new validation
Custom field (Release Note): Fixed an issue in the SchemaBuilder class where an undefined array key "column" caused a crash during schema creation or updates. This occurred when processing table data that did not include a "column" key.

Summary: qty showing as  0 in the admin customer shopping cart section while adding BUNDLE products
Custom field (Release Note): The Shopping Cart section in Customer Activities now displays the correct quantity. Previously, the quantity was shown as 0.

Summary: Order "base_row_total" and "row_total" show single item price in REST API response
Custom field (Release Note): REST api response for order details now contains correct values for "base_row_total" and "row_total" attributes in case when several same items were ordered

Summary: Product graphql missing media_type in MediaGalleryInterface
Custom field (Release Note): The MediaGallery GraphQL request now includes the "types" field for product image types. Previously, this "types" field did not exist in the MediaGallery GraphQL request.

Summary: is_available attribute in CartItemInterface returns false even when salable stock is high
Custom field (Release Note): The is_available attribute returns true when salable stock is high. Previously, it always return false.

Summary: Categories in admin are loading very slow
Custom field (Release Note): The category loading performance has a significant improved. Previously, it took so long to load the category that caused a timeout issue.

Summary: Opensearch 2.19.1 illegal_argument_exception on one-priced categories
Custom field (Release Note): Opensearch is no longer throwing an illegal_argument_exception on the categories containing all products with the same price. Previously, it has this exception "[from] parameter cannot be negative".

Summary: Page Builder Product Widget ordering not being applied in GraphQL
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where the GraphQL "route" query response did not return products in the correct sort order within a Page Builder Products content type.

Summary: Update product url_key via REST API does not generate a 301 URL Rewrite
Custom field (Release Note): When updating the URL key of the product via the REST API, with the "Create Permanent Redirect for URLs if URL Key Changed" setting set to Yes, the product URL rewrites are create a redirect from old URL to a new one.

Summary: [ATLH] Fatal error when there is no differences
Custom field (Release Note): Fatal Error does not appear anymore when there is no difference to show

Summary: [QUANS] - Does Magento_Fedex core module check for a valid-active token before sending a request to get a new one?
Custom field (Release Note): Adobe Commerce is no long make many requests to FedEx API service for the access token. Previously, even though the access token is still valid, Adobe Commerce always make new requests to FedEx API which caused a rate limiting issue.

Summary: Provided CountryID Does not Exist - Ireland (IE)
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, Ireland postcodes are available to search for pickup locations.

Summary: customerOrders graphql returns error when product was deleted
Custom field (Release Note): The customerOrders graphql request is no longer throwing an error even the product in the order was deleted. Previously, "Internal server error" error was thrown.

Summary: Pricing Display Issue on Non-English Storefronts Due to ICU Library Version
Custom field (Release Note): After the fix, the product price is displayed correctly in the Hebrew (Israel) locale.

Summary: Updating Store Code Cleared Design Configuration
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where updating the store view code cleared the Design Configuration settings due to the configuration cache not being properly refreshed.

Summary: Error in mapping message to error code when placing order via GraphQL
Custom field (Release Note): GraphQL calls to place an order for a nonexistent or inactive cart now correctly return CART_NOT_ACTIVE or CART_NOT_FOUND error codes in all store views, fixing an issue where translated error messages previously resulted in an UNDEFINED code.

Summary: Order status stuck on Processing
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, when ordering a bundle product with "Ship toghether" option enabled, the order status did not automatically switch to "complete" after invoice and shipment. Now, after the fix, the order status automatically switches to "complete" after the order has been invoiced and shipped.

Summary: [CLOUD] Order information issue with row total appearance for order 000075568
Custom field (Release Note): Fixes the issue where the row_total_incl_tax value in the order API response was returned as a near-zero residual value instead of 0.00 when an item was fully discounted.

Summary: PHP8.4 Deprecation Error: E_USER_ERROR after Upgrade to Adobe Commerce 2.4.8
Custom field (Release Note): Customer-facing scenarios are not affected by the fix.

Summary: Wishlist items are not shared between stores views within one website in GraphQL request
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, wishlist items were filtered by store id. Now, after the fix, wishlist items are filtered by website.

Summary: [Cloud]Magento OOTB code - Email Template Setup issue
Custom field (Release Note): Prior to the fix, when using async email sending, shipment emails were incosisten with the store order. Now, after the fix, the proper store shipment email order is delivered.
